tool_description: Metadata on publicly available information on various pageant contests.
title: PageantDB

api_list.name: Single Country
api_list.description: Get all details of a country by its ID.

api_list.name: Search Country
api_list.description: Search country if they had an active pageant contest.

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description: Get a list of all countries involved in a pageant contest.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pageantdb.p.rapidapi.com/countries/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pageantdb.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.description: Get details of a single pageant contest by its ID.

api_list.name: All pageant contests
api_list.description: Get a list of all pageant contests.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pageantdb.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pageantdb.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
